title: Conversion of C8 aromatics over a dual-bed catalyst
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19054-19061
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03078H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Peixi Feng, Chenglin Kang, Zhenhuan Zhou, Xin Yue, Zhongxun Liu, Yueting Gai, Junjun Shi, Baoning Zong
The isomerization of xylene occurs on a dual-bed catalyst, comprising an upper layer of SiO2-covered ZSM-5 and a lower layer of ZSM-39. The double-layer catalyst exhibits superior catalytic performance compared to its single-layer counterpart.
